trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section in a configuration file.
The `<system.identityModel.services>` section configures authentication using WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: `<system.identityModel.services>` Раздел настраивает проверку подлинности с использованием протокола WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: It contains elements that configure the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM).
trans-unit.target: Он содержит элементы, которые настраивают <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>(WSFAM) и <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>(SAM).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref> class.
Gets a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает ссылку на <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""> </xref> раздел из файла конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section from the configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the configuration file does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Если файл конфигурации не содержит <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""> </xref> раздела.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unnamed <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает неименованного <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> элемент из файла конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: The unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element does not have its `name` attribute set (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`).
trans-unit.target: Неименованные `<federationConfiguration>` элемент не имеет его `name` набором атрибутов (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> свойство `null`).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The unnamed <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Неименованные <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> элемент из файла конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the configuration file does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Если файл конфигурации не содержит <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""> </xref> раздела.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> elements configured in this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает коллекцию <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> элементы, настроенные в это <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""> </xref> раздела.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> elements configured in this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: Коллекция, содержащая все <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""> </xref> элементы, настроенные в это <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""> </xref> раздела.

trans-unit.source: A constant that defines the name of the configuration section; “system.identityModel.services”.
